sentences.english: Nominal predication and verbalized noun are two phenomena in Contemporary, Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 體詞性謂語現象是一種語言現象。

sentences.english: Adverbials usually come after the verb, or after the object if there is one.
sentences.chinese: 狀語通常置於謂語動詞或賓語之後。

sentences.english: The information about predicates is inferred using the available query workloads.
sentences.chinese: 關於謂語的信息可以使用可用查詢工作負載進行推測。

sentences.english: Verb is always the predicative in the sentence.
sentences.chinese: 動詞，在句子中經常充當謂語。

sentences.english: Your duty is to look after the sick child.
sentences.chinese: 你的責任是非謂語動詞的用法照料這個病孩。

sentences.english: The lausal predicate is of unique syntactic pattern in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 主謂謂語句是漢語的一種特殊句式。

sentences.english: Two years later they bought Warsaw-based Uroda toiletries.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後，他們又併購了謂語華沙的烏諾達化妝品公司。

sentences.english: Note that the subject is omitted in commands, so the verb comes first.
sentences.chinese: 請留意在祈使句中主語省略，謂語動詞前置。

sentences.english: There are four categories of predicative sentences with repeated mono syllabic verbs in Hui'an dialect.
sentences.chinese: 惠安方言單音動詞重疊謂語句主要有四類。

sentences.english: Here is an is as a predication.
Most sentences contain a subject and a verb. "(Collins Cobuild) ?"
sentences.chinese: 大多數句子有主語和謂語。

sentences.english: Predicate for the main verb, the more tense voice changes.
sentences.chinese: 動詞主要作謂語，時態語態多變化。

sentences.english: Verbs and verb-predictive sentences are of particular importance in syntactic patterns.
sentences.chinese: 動詞和動詞謂語句是句型系統中特別重要的部分。

sentences.english: A substance was supposed to be the persistent subject of varying predicates.
sentences.chinese: 實體被人設想爲是變化不同的謂語之永恆不變的主詞。

sentences.english: Clausal predicate is a special but normal sentence structure in the Chinese language which always exists in the history.
sentences.chinese: 主謂謂語句是漢語獨具特色又較爲常見的句式。

sentences.english: In form, it is similar to the verb-predicate sentence in which subject-predicate phrase used as an object.
sentences.chinese: 在形式上，它和主謂短語作賓語的動詞謂語句很相似。

definition: to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
